list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a painful feeling of humiliation or distress caused by the consciousness of wrong or foolish behavior.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy nóng bỏng với sự xấu hổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person, action, or situation) make (someone) feel ashamed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I tried to shame him into giving some away
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã cố gắng xấu hổ anh ta đưa ra một số
